sentences.sContent: The upright orientation is also the first step in surface detachment for bacteria.
sentences.sContent_eng: The upright orientation is also the first step in surface detachment for bacteria.
sentences.sCn: 这种直立的方位也是细菌脱离组织表面的第一步。

synos.tran: 分离，拆开；超然；分遣；分遣队

phrases.pCn: 拆离断层；滑脱断层；脱顶断层；挤离断层

words.tran: 可分开的；可拆开的；可分遣的

trans.tranOther: when something becomes separated from something else
